title: Jack Gleeson (hurler)
summary: John Gleeson (22 June 1910 - December 1970) was an Irish hurler.  He played with his local club Roscrea and was a member of the Tipperary senior inter-county team in the late 1930s.  Gleeson won a set of All-Ireland and Munster winners' medals with Tipperary in 1937.
